title: How to Make Violet and Green Bean Salad

steps.headline: Steam the green beans until they're just tender.
Pour equal amounts of olive oil, lemon juice and orange juice into a bowl.
steps.description: Balance the amounts according to taste; you can a little bit more of any of these three ingredients as preferred.

steps.headline: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour the olive oil, lemon juice and orange juice base onto the plate.
steps.description: Place the green beans over the top of the base.

steps.headline: Finish by sprinkling with fresh violet flowers.
steps.description: It is now ready to serve, warm.

text: Steam the green beans until they're just tender. Don't overcook them. Pour equal amounts of olive oil, lemon juice and orange juice into a bowl. Balance the amounts according to taste; you can a little bit more of any of these three ingredients as preferred. Season with salt and pepper to taste.  Pour the olive oil, lemon juice and orange juice base onto the plate. Place the green beans over the top of the base. Finish by sprinkling with fresh violet flowers. It is now ready to serve, warm.
